title: How far is science from finding a way of us getting muscular without working out? - Quora

response.answer_text: Q: How far is science from finding a way of us getting muscular without working out? For those yet to be embryos, the answer is now. Genetic engineering of zygotes has resulted in markedly muscular livestock, and dogs, without apparent side effects. They have larger and stronger muscles, heavier birth weights, and heavier adult weight due to higher proportions of muscular tissue. Visually the resulting phenotype is dramatically more muscular than normal—comparable to a human professional bodybuilder. The genetic transformation can be both somatic and germ-line. Ignoring ethical concerns, this technology could be applied to humans zygotes today.

That would be extremely far off because that would involve so many things nutrition your heart rate your house I could go on forever there will never be some kind of magical thing that will ever take away the work that you have to do to become physically mentally and emotionally right and healthy and look that way

What do you have against working out? Change your attitude toward the ache in your muscles. If you see that ache as a promise that you are going stronger, you will not avoid it so much and your results will be better.
